[DQC.US.0009.42] The value of Defined Benefit Plan, Pension Plan with Accumulated Benefit Obligation in Excess of Plan Assets, Projected Benefit Obligation, 584,000,000, should be less than or equal to Defined Benefit Plan, Benefit Obligation, 583,000,000. Defined Benefit Plan, Pension Plan with Accumulated Benefit Obligation in Excess of Plan Assets, Projected Benefit Obligation is a subset of Defined Benefit Plan, Benefit Obligation.
